import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission here console.log('Form submitted:', formData); // Reset form setFormData({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); }; const contactInfo = [ { icon: 'fas fa-envelope', title: 'Email', value: 'sourovmmoysanju@gmail.com', color: 'text-blue-500', href: 'mailto:sourovmmoysanju@gmail.com' }, { icon: 'fas fa-phone-alt', title: 'Phone', value: '+8801742818496', color: 'text-green-500', href: 'tel:+8801742818496' }, { icon: 'fas fa-map-marker-alt', title: 'Location', value: 'Naogaon, Rajshahi, Bangladesh', color: 'text-red-500', href: null } ]; const socialLinks = [ { icon: 'fab fa-github', color: 'hover:bg-gray-800', href: '#' }, { icon: 'fab fa-linkedin-in', color: 'hover:bg-blue-600', href: '#' }, { icon: 'fab fa-twitter', color: 'hover:bg-blue-400', href: '#' }, { icon: 'fab fa-facebook-f', color: 'hover:bg-blue-700', href: '#' } ]; return (
{/* Background Pattern */}

info.href && window.open(info.href, '_self')} >

); }; export default Contact;
